turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to get some coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to try the Havana Cappuccino from Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and what size did you want to try it in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. So that's a large Havana Cappuccino. Did you want any syrups in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I do a shorter vanilla? So I put it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. And what milk did you want in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright that's an Almond milk vanilla syrup Havana Cappuccino, large sized.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's correct. Can I have some whipped cream, too?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great and what Peet's did you want to pick this up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From the one on 29th Street in Boulder, Colorado.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. I've placed this order with the Starbucks on 29th street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready for pickup soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a nice day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
